Text:
In the immortal words of Murderface, legendary bass player for Dethklok: "Don't be a dick - be a dude!" 

If you enjoy this Rifftrax, do Mike and the guys a solid and buy this or a few of their other commentary tracks at the main site listed below the 'Download Torrent' link.  

It's cheaper than a pint of imported beer, and a lot funnier.  Well, unless you glass some poor bastard with it, that's always pretty amusing.
